fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visit a person every night.
- Use your wished wealth to hire a hitman on someone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When rolled, a random other player will be rerolled into being the *Gambit Snail*.
- You cannot be killed by anyone besides the *Gambit Snail*.
- Visiting is mandatory; you also may only visit a person once.
- Hitman deals an Astral Basic Attack. You may only hire a hitman twice.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game
